{"id":391765956,"lang":"cpp","time":"11Â months","timestamp":1599382928,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/391765956/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"ZigZag Conversion","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string convert(string s, int numRows) {\n        std::vector<string> vecRows(numRows,\"\");\n        auto chInd = 0 ;\n        for (auto ch : s){\n            auto remainder = chInd % (2*numRows -2);\n            auto rowInd = (remainder > numRows-1 ) ? 2*numRows - remainder-2: remainder;\n            vecRows[rowInd] += ch;\n            chInd += 1 ;\n        }\n        std::string ansString =\"\" ; \n        for (auto str : vecRows){\n            ansString += str;\n        }\n        return ansString;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion"}
